content: Couldn’t agree more. First said Apple’s initiative was not serious and now, tries to communicate 18 months in advance on a market that changes really fast. This makes no sense. If he had a bright idea or a great project, he should develop it in silence and stun the whole world when ready. Communicating right now will just keep competition working harder and set expectations that will not meet reality.See you next year, with a R&D and M&A that will have spent 1B for nothing expect keep hope… expensive placebo to me.
